subject: Hockey, Ice
lead_paragraph: Radek Martinek’s slap shot midway through the second period broke the cage on the mask of San Jose goalie Evgeni Nabokov, sending him to the dressing room to receive stitches on his nose.
snippet: Radek Martinek’s slap shot midway through the second period broke the cage on the mask of San Jose goalie Evgeni Nabokov, sending him to the dressing room to receive stitches on his nose.
